Episodes.Title: Pilot (1)
Episodes.Plot: A new team of detectives, the Cold Case Squad,  is put together to re-examine evidence of unsolved murders using advanced technology. In their first investigation DCI Peter Boyd  has a second go at nailing the murderer of Alice Miller, a young girl who disappeared five years ago. Trouble is, the perpetrator is as keen as Boyd to act again, and abducts another girl.
Episodes.GuestStars: Amelia Warner,  John Vine,  Roger  Taylor,  David Sterne,  Lachlan   Ryan,  Finbar Lynch,  Sam Loggin,  Steven Elder,  Elaine Claxton,  Noel Clarke,  Tyler Butterworth,  Adie Allen

Episodes.Title: Pilot (2)
Episodes.Plot: Hoping that new DNA tests will reveal the killer's identity, DCI Boyd has the original abductee's body exhumed.  But he soon comes to discover that the kidnapper is looking for more than money -- he wants revenge on Boyd's team.
Episodes.GuestStars: Noel Clarke,  Amelia Warner,  Elaine Claxton,  Steven Elder,  Sam Loggin,  Finbar Lynch,  Lachlan  Ryan,  David Sterne,  Roger  Taylor,  John Vine,  Adie Allen,  Tyler Butterworth

Episodes.Title: Burn Out (1)
Episodes.Plot:
A young woman, Marina sets fire to an abandoned car in a street and takes photographs of it as it burns. Boyd walks by and tackles her to the ground, attempting to shield her from the possible explosion.  He later learns that Marina's father died in a car accident a few years earlier in that spot, and Marina refuses to accept that his death was an accident.

Although not officially a cold case, Boyd is intrigued and reluctantly agrees to investigate. Frankie runs forensic tests on Marina's fathe
Episodes.GuestStars: Leonard Webster,  Simon Kunz,  Peter Gallagher,  Beverley Hills,  Ralph Brown,  Clive Russell,  Angela Griffin

Episodes.Title: Burn Out (2)
Episodes.Plot:
Boyd has Marinas uncle, Mike Coleman and her mother Gwen brought in for questioning while Frankie searches the house. The team find the items that were recovered from the car nine years ago and suspect that Perry Coleman was being blackmailed by Rod Brogan, a friend of Perry's.
Boyd has the body exhumed and the DNA results suprise everyone
Episodes.GuestStars: Peter Gallagher,  Leonard Webster,  Ralph Brown,  Peter Gallagher,  Angela Griffin,  Beverley Hills,  Simon Kunz,  Clive Russell

Episodes.Title: The Blind Beggar (1)
Episodes.Plot:
Workmen are burrowing in the crypt of a Catholic church when they come across  the skeletal remains of a young man buried in concrete. The squad sets about trying to pinpoint the identity of the body, which was buried with the accoutrements of certain Catholic rituals. Even more oddly, there is a message in Braille buried with the corpse, which tums out to be a passage from one of St Paul's letters to the Corinthians
The team suspects that the body was never meant to be discovered.
Episodes.GuestStars: Peter Oliver Warnock,  Barry Morse,  James Hayes,  Annette Crosbie,  Con O'Neill,  Caroline O'Neill,  Alan Leith,  Heather Bleasdale,  Jackie Clune

Episodes.Title: The Blind Beggar (2)
Episodes.Plot:
The hunt continues for the murderer. 

The team uncovers some long hidden family secrets while questioning the community & congregation. Also Frankie discovers a possible biological connection between the former parish priest, Father Stuart, and the first victim.
Episodes.GuestStars: Heather Bleasdale,  Con O'Neill,  Caroline O'Neill,  Annette Crosbie,  Alan Leith,  James Hayes,  Jackie Clune,  Barry Morse

Episodes.Title: A Simple Sacrifice (1)
Episodes.Plot: Boyd and the team decide to reopen the 25 year old case of Annie Keel, a woman who was tried and convicted of a double homicide solely based upon her own confession. Boyd doubts the validity of the conviction, and decides to dig deeper to possibly discover what really happened. Why did Annie confess? Did she really commit murder, or was she covering for someone else?
Episodes.GuestStars: Cal Macaninch,  Lynda Bellingham,  Anthony Valentine,  Nicholas Woodeson,  Robert Blythe,  Janet Dale,  Valerie Gogan,  Nicholas Hoult,  Elliott Henderson-Boyle,  Harriet Walter,  Rakie Ayola

Episodes.Title: A Simple Sacrifice (2)
Episodes.Plot: Boyd and the team continue their investigation of the Annie Kee case, and try to locate her son who was present during the murders.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lynda Bellingham,  Janet Dale,  Valerie Gogan,  Elliot Henderson-Boyle,  Nicholas Hoult,  Cal Macaninch,  Anthony Valentine,  Nicholas Woodeson,  Rakie Ayola,  Robert Blythe,  Harriet Walter
